      플레밍 안드레아슨(5.24, 5.32, 5.33, 14),

- Rohan Mahy(5.54), Eric Burger(5.26), Christian Huitema(5.14), Christer Holmberg(5.21, 5.26, 12.2, 12.3), Richard Ejzak(5.44, 5.50, 5.51), Colin Perkins(5.7, 5.8, 5.9, 5.55), Magnus Westerlund(5.2, 5.3, 5.9, 5.27, 5.47, 6.1 - 6.3, 8.3, 7), Roni Even(5.12, 5.27, 8.4), Subha Dhesikan(5.6, 10), Dan Wing(5.7, 5.12, 5.35, 5.39, 5.45), Cullen Jennings(5.40), Ali C Begen(5.1, 5.20, 5.22, 5.25, 5.38, 7.3, 8.2, 8.4, 8.6, 9.2, 13.1), Bo Burman(7.2, 7.6), Charles Eckel (5.15, 5.27, 5.28, 9.1, 8.5), Paul Kyzivat(5.24), Ian Johansson(5.15), Saravanan Shanmugham(5.11), Paul E Jones(5.30), Rajesh Kumar(5.48), Jonathan Lennox(5.36, 5, 15, 9.1, 11.1), Mo Zanaty(5.4, 5.5, 5.23, 8.1, 8.3, 8.5, 12.1), Christian Huitema(5.14), Qin Wu(5.47, PM-Dir 리뷰), Hans Stokking(5.43, 5.16), Christian Groves(5.48, 5.52) 및 Thomas Stach.
